attributes.action: Abolish standing charges on gas and electricity bills
attributes.additional_details: My standing charge for both is £233 a year plus vat. If I decide to go on holiday for a long period I still have to pay.  I've just calculated using relative figures, how much revenue it has  given the companies since the house was built in 1962 it  equals £12,147  for doing absolutely nothing.  It is a ridiculous state of affairs. Why can't it just be a price per unit at a higher cost if neccessary then at least one has the choice to use it or not if the bills are too high. As it is one is paying for nothing.
